trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The downhearted youth stares despondently into the middle distance.
TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_TODO_00<tab>Present the engraved metal tag to Delia at Mosaic.
TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the engraved metal tag to Melancholy at the Neon Stein.
TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the bottle of luxury liquor and the message to the downhearted youth.

TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MOB05167_000_000<tab>I think I recognize you... You risked life and limb to protect us when Zoraal Ja and his forces attacked. I'm almost hesitant to bring it up, but I have a favor to ask.

TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MOB05167_000_001<tab>I'm an usher. I tend to citizens on the verge of death, and collect the bodies of those whose soul supply has run dry. The other day, I was transporting the body of an elderly man to the processing facility...

TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MOB05167_000_002<tab>Ever since then, try as I might, I just can't shake the image of his face from my mind. What's worse─and I still don't know what drove me to it─I <var 1A 02 /var>stole<var 1A 01 /var> one of his keepsakes... This tiny metal trinket.

TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MOB05167_000_003<tab>It's engraved with the name “Travertine,” but I have no idea what purpose it served to begin with. I'm dying to know the story behind it, though. Can I ask you to investigate?

TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MOB05167_000_004<tab>Ideally I'd do this all myself, but it's probably best I don't go around asking about the trinket <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> stole... Anyway, starting your search here at Mosaic might be a good idea. The proprietor is something of a collector of mementos and knickknacks. See what she has to say.
TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MOB05167_000_005<tab>Speak with Mosaic's proprietor. She collects all kinds of keepsakes and curios─she might know something about that trinket.
TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_DELIA_000_010<tab>Welcome. What can I get for you?

TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_DELIA_000_011<tab>So you're on a mission to find out the story behind this little trinket? Well, given its size, shape, and inscription, I'd say that you've got yourself a bottle tag─the sort of thing you see at bars and the like, marking out which bottle belongs to who.
TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_DELIA_000_012<tab>Unfortunately for you, Everkeep is home to dozens of drinking establishments. Figuring out where the tag was being used may take some time...

TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_DELIA_000_013<tab>Ah, I might have spoken too soon. If you catch it in the right light, you can just make out what appears to be a tankard filled to the brim with pebbles on the back of the tag.

TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_DELIA_000_014<tab>Which leaves only one possibility: this is from a bar called the Neon Stein. They've been serving thirsty patrons on True Vue for years now. Could be worth a visit.
TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_DELIA_000_015<tab>That golden tag of yours is almost certainly from the Neon Stein. I'd suggest heading there to see what else you can find out.
TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MOB05167_100_015<tab>I do hope you can find out more about that tag.
TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MELANCHOLY_000_016<tab>We meet again.
TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MELANCHOLY_000_017<tab>Yep, this is one of our bottle tags. Don't recall any regulars who went by Travertine, though. Which implies their memories are no longer with us.
TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MELANCHOLY_000_018<tab>Hold on a moment.
TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MELANCHOLY_000_019<tab>Ah, here it is. This bottle's already been paid for, so go on, you have it. Just make sure you deliver the message that came with it, okay?
TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MELANCHOLY_000_020<tab>Like I said, whoever that belonged to has already settled up. Make sure that message gets delivered.
TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MOB05167_000_030<tab>Did you find out the story behind that little trinket?
TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MOB05167_000_031<tab>A bottle tag, you say? And these were behind the bar? An unopened bottle and, ah...what's this?
TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MOB05167_000_032<tab>Hmmm? This card is made out to me. But...

TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MOB05167_000_033<tab>(-Message from Travertine-)<var 1A 02 /var>Between your nameday and your new job, there is much to celebrate as I pen these words. No matter our circumstances, it is a solitary path we walk at the end. Know that it fills me with pride to see you tend to the dying with such patience and care.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MOB05167_000_035<tab>Of course... Travertine─he was my father. That explains why his face haunted me so...

TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MOB05167_000_036<tab>To tell you the truth, ever since Zoraal Ja's raid on the city, the work I do has left me feeling empty. All those bodies─all those lives─I had to usher on their way...
TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MOB05167_000_037<tab>But knowing that my father was proud of me changes everything... Besides, being an usher, I was able to give him the send-off he deserved.

TEXT_KINGZG004_05167_MOB05167_000_038<tab>I appreciate you taking the time to do all this─I'm sure you don't have much to spare... I think I'm ready to find meaning in my work again. And for that, I have you to thank just as much as my father. Farewell.
